snippet: BLANK--Robert S. We send our love as well as our deepest condolences to Nancy and the entire Blank Family. Bob was a very special friend and his passing is a great loss to all who knew him. We will miss him enormously. Ann and Charley 1/3
lead_paragraph: BLANK--Robert S. We send our love as well as our deepest condolences to Nancy and the entire Blank Family. Bob was a very special friend and his passing is a great loss to all who knew him. We will miss him enormously. Ann and Charley 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  BLANK, ROBERT S
